sensory_systems.name: Advanced Dough Rheology Sensor
sensory_systems.description: A multi-modal sensor suite to continuously monitor dough properties in real-time. Includes shear rate sensors, extensometers, viscosity probes, and a micro-CT scanner for internal structure analysis.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Correlation with manual dough assessment (expert panel)

sensory_systems.name: Volatile Organic Compound (VOC) Analyzer
sensory_systems.description: A highly sensitive sensor array to detect and quantify aroma compounds released during fermentation and baking stages.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Comparison with human sensory panel (odor intensity, specific aroma profiles)

sensory_systems.name: Thermal Imaging Camera (High Resolution)
sensory_systems.description: Real-time monitoring of oven temperature distribution and crust color development.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Correlation with oven temperature readings and visual crust color assessment

sensory_systems.name: Automated Visual Inspection System
sensory_systems.description: High-resolution camera system with AI-powered image analysis for defect detection (cracks, uneven rise, etc.)
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Precision and recall metrics on a labeled dataset of bread defects

control_systems.name: Model Predictive Control (MPC) Engine
control_systems.description: Advanced control algorithm that predicts dough behavior and adjusts parameters (temperature, humidity, mixing speed) to optimize baking outcomes.

specifications.control_variables: Temperature, Humidity, Mixing Speed, Ingredient Dosing

control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Reduction in baking time, improvement in crust color, and consistency of final product

control_systems.name: Adaptive Fuzzy Logic Controller
control_systems.description: Combines fuzzy logic with real-time sensor data for robust control in varying conditions.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Maintaining desired crust color and crumb structure despite variations in ingredient quality

mechanical_systems.name: Precision Robotic Arm (Multi-Axis)
mechanical_systems.description: A 6-axis robotic arm for automated ingredient dispensing, dough handling, and shaping.
mechanical_systems.accuracy_metrics: Consistency of dough shaping and ingredient distribution

mechanical_systems.name: Automated Dough Mixer (Variable Speed)
mechanical_systems.description: A mixer with precise speed control and integrated sensors for real-time viscosity monitoring.

mechanical_systems.name: Forming System (Continuous)
mechanical_systems.description: A system for continuous dough shaping based on extrusion or other advanced forming techniques.

software_integretation.name: Digital Twin Platform
software_integretation.description: A virtual representation of the entire bread-making process, used for simulation, optimization, and predictive maintenance.

specifications.data_integration: Sensor data, process parameters, historical data

software_integretation.accuracy_metrics: Reduction in baking errors, optimization of process parameters

software_integretation.name: Reinforcement Learning Agent
software_integretation.description: An AI agent trained to optimize baking parameters based on real-time feedback.

specifications.reward_function: Based on sensory data and quality metrics
specifications.training_data: Generated from simulations and real-world experiments
